amendment.description: Amendment provides that none of the funds in the bill may be used in contravention of section 303 of the Energy Policy Act of 1992 which requires that alternative fueled vehicles be acquired by the Federal government for the Federal fleet.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being used in contravention of section 303 of the Energy Policy Act of 1992.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.
